title: Saul Bass title sequence fonts.....
content:
Can anyone help with the following fonts

In Harm's Way  
The Victors  
Big Country  
Nine Hours To Rama  
Exodus

and the version of Bodoni from his book cover?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130607102949im_/http:/typophile.com/files/9784416603031_5777.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [vlcsnap-121715.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130607102949/http:/typophile.com/files/vlcsnap-121715.png) | 527.53 KB |
| [vlcsnap-124796.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130607102949/http:/typophile.com/files/vlcsnap-124796.png) | 503.89 KB |
| [vlcsnap-124126.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130607102949/http:/typophile.com/files/vlcsnap-124126.png) | 512.43 KB |
| [vlcsnap-125438.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130607102949/http:/typophile.com/files/vlcsnap-125438.png) | 233.94 KB |
| [vlcsnap-12543exodus.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130607102949/http:/typophile.com/files/vlcsnap-12543exodus.jpg) | 73.98 KB |
| [vlcsnap-125438\_1776.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130607102949/http:/typophile.com/files/vlcsnap-125438_1776.jpg) | 68.31 KB |
author: sinoran_knight

comments.content:
That Didone is probably pre-digital, but you can find some alts [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20130607102949/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/genres/didone_extra_bold/?&sample_text=SB%26A&sample_size=48&update=0).

In Harm's Way: [Eurostile](http://web.archive.org/web/20130607102949/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/eurostile_std_bold/?&sample_text=IN%20HARM%E2%80%99S%20WAY&sample_size=48&update=0)  
The Victors: probably film-based font, best approximation I know is [Titling Gothic](http://web.archive.org/)

The rest are lettered by hand.
